item.description:
Time: 5.30pm - 8pm
Date: Wednesday, March 10, 2009
Place: 116 Crown, downtown New Haven

Find us in the front bar or raised area in back. If you're not sure where to go, ask the hostess or bartender. If you are the first person, hang around for a bit, the meetup is casual and people will show up between 5:30 and 6.

Please RSVP in Advance!

Please also note that we do not ever officially cancel the meetup (for those who live downtown or close by), but in instances of bad weather, if you do come, please don't expect our full crowd!
item.name: March Networking Meetup
